meanings.sent1: The darer stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent2: The brave darer saved the cat stuck in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The little darer challenged the older kids to a game of tag.
meanings.sent4: She was a true darer, never backing down from a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The darer's fearless spirit inspired others to be courageous too.

meanings.definition: To have the necessary courage or boldness to do something.
meanings.sent1: I darer to try the spicy food at the new restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She darers to speak up for what she believes in.
meanings.sent3: The cat darers to climb to the top of the tree for a better view.
meanings.sent4: He darers to face his fears and conquer them one by one.
meanings.sent5: The team darers to take on the undefeated champions in the final match.
